name: telequest
description: Web App That Promotes Interactivity During A Live Video Streaming Session (Senior Project - Spring 2019)

scripts.install-script: npm install --only=production && cd server && npm install --only=production && cd ../client && npm install --only=production
scripts.install-script-dev: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.test: cd server && npm run test && cd .. && cd client && npm run test
scripts.circle-ci: concurrently --success first --raw --kill-others "npm run server-dev" "sleep 10 && npm run test"
